description: n consecutive primes differ by 6 or more starting at a(n).
mathematica: With[{prs=Prime[Range[30000]]},First/@Flatten[Table[Select[ Partition[ prs,n,1], Min[ Differences[#]]>5&,1],{n,2,40}],1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 18 2014 *)
author: _Jeff Burch_, Apr 19 2000
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Nov 09 2000
